remarks: In a normal space, given a closed set ` B ` inside an open set ` A ` , there is an open set ` x ` such that ` B C_ x C_ cls ( x ) C_ A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
statement:
nrmsep3 $p |- ( ( J e. Nrm /\ ( A e. J /\ B e. ( Clsd ` J ) /\ B C_ A ) ) -> E. x e. J ( B C_ x /\ ( ( cls ` J ) ` x ) C_ A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d J x $.
